column1: #Text=Britain thinks Africans are barbaric , claims South African President
#Text=File photo of Jacob Zuma Image : World Economic Forum .
#Text=Jacob Zuma , President of South Africa , claimed Britain believed Africa is " barbaric " , hours before a state visit to Queen Elizabeth II .
#Text=These claims were made after the Daily Mail described him as a " sex-obsessed bigot and vile buffoon .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=Zuma accused Britons of considering themselves to be culturally superior owing to their past colonial activities .

#Text=According to him , he had never  looked down upon any culture of anyone " and that no one has the authority of judging other cultures .

#Text= British media seem to have developed a habit of rubbishing our president and constantly portray him as barbaric and of inferior belonging , " the youth league said .
